faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our transportation services

q1.question: Where do you operate?
q1.answer: We serve local Montreal routes and long-distance travel, including Québec and up-north destinations. Contact us to confirm availability for your specific route or trip.

q2.question: Do you offer transportation for field trips and special events?
q2.answer: Absolutely! We provide transportation for field trips, sports events, business trips, family trips, and special events like Shabbatons for synagogues. Contact us to discuss your specific needs.

q3.question: How do I register my child for school bus transportation?
q3.answer: For large schools, we work through school contracts and registration. For private services, families can contact us directly through our website, phone, or email to discuss registration and setup.

q4.question: How do I book a bus?
q4.answer: You can book by contacting us through our website, email, or phone. Our team will guide you through availability, pricing, and scheduling to find the perfect solution for your needs.

q5.question: What are your operating hours?
q5.answer: We operate 24/7 to serve all transportation needs. Whether it's school routes, business trips, or special events, we're constantly working to accommodate our clients.

q6.question: What safety measures are in place on your buses?
q6.answer: Safety is at the core of everything we do. Our buses undergo daily inspections before every trip, are equipped with first aid kits and fire extinguishers, and have proper exit doors. Our drivers are professionally trained and follow strict safety protocols on every trip.

q7.question: What happens if my child misses the bus?
q7.answer: If your child misses the bus, please contact our office immediately. Depending on the route, we may be able to pick them up at a later stop. Contact us to discuss your specific situation.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded almost two decades ago in 2008, Autobus Bensimhon has grown to become a trusted provider of safe and reliable transportation for students throughout Quebec.
story.p2: Our company's primary goal has always been to ensure that every child arrives to and back from school, safely and on time. Over the years, we have built lasting relationships with schools, parents, and communities across the province.
story.p3: Today, we operate a modern fleet of buses and continue to invest in the latest safety technology and eco-friendly vehicles to better serve our communities and protect our environment.
story.cardDescription: Started with a vision to provide the safest school transportation services in the region.
